citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The facility does not currently have a functioning cage washer. The large cage washer became non-functional in March
2023. The small cage washer became non-functional in mid-April 2023. Without a functioning cage washer, the facility
cannot adequately clean and disinfect animal cages.
The IACUC is responsible for reviewing all of the institution’s animal facilities at least once every six months, but more
frequently if necessary, and making recommendations to the IO concerning those facilities. The lack of a functional cage
washer should be communicated to the IO as soon as possible so that the washers can be repaired, and cleaning
requirements can be met.
To be corrected by June 1, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(5) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The facility does not currently have a functioning cage washer.  The large cage washer became non-functional in March 
2023.  The small cage washer became non-functional in mid-April 2023.  Without a functioning cage washer, the facility 
cannot adequately clean and disinfect animal cages.   
The IACUC is responsible for reviewing all of the institution’s animal facilities at least once every six months, but more 
frequently if necessary, and making recommendations to the IO concerning those facilities.  The lack of a functional cage 
washer should be communicated to the IO as soon as possible so that the washers can be repaired, and cleaning 
requirements can be met. 
To be corrected by June 1, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
